name: Slice Dice (RikiSneaky)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. A short game where you fight by rolling dice. Due to overscope I did not have the time to implement all the things I wanted, apologies in advance.
Press E to access levels and roll the dice.
Art:
https://vimlark.itch.io/vimlark-asset-pack
https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack
